content: I think I've got a good idea of what I need to do to turn my team around. I'll start by re-evaluating my lineup and focusing on acquiring more consistent hitters. I'll also make sure to prioritize on-base percentage and plate discipline when making trades or picking up players off the waiver wire. Additionally, I'll try to balance my lineup with a mix of power, speed, and on-base ability to create a well-rounded offense. Thanks for the advice!
